library(caret)


## Dividiendo la data en test y train

set.seed(123)
data <- read.csv("train.csv")

# partimos el dataset en training (65%) y testing (35%) 
trainIndex <- createDataPartition(data$target_variable, p = 0.65, list = FALSE)
training_data <- data[trainIndex, ]
testing_data <- data[-trainIndex, ]
